Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Spell Fulfillment application

A FastAPI-based spell order management system with:
- API endpoints for orders, spells, spell types, tasks, and metrics
- Database models with Alembic migrations
- Services for Etsy integration, Claude AI, and fulfillment
- HTML templates for dashboard, orders, tasks, and settings
- Docker and docker-compose configuration
- Authentication and operator management

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
